page.title: 08EDUCATION and ENERGY
page.content:
{EDUCATION}There are no local education facilities. Children attend primary school in Preston Candover and secondary education is provided at Perins in Alresford or are educated privately.
{ENERGY}Every house is provided with mains electricity. In addition some have oil-fired, bottled gas, heat-pump or solid-fuel heating and/or cooking appliances. Wood-burning heating stoves are also found. One householder draws water from a bore-hole and all the rest have mains water supply. Payment for electricity is levied by the Southern Electricity Board and water rates are levied by the Southern Water Authority.
